data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cui, Le, Xue, Dayong, Jiang, Nan (2019): Description of two new species of Rhodostrophia Hübner, 1823 from China (Lepidoptera, Geometridae). Zootaxa 4563 (2): 337-353, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4563.2.7|55 occurrences
